profile_requirement_info:
Thank you for using our application. Please read and understand the following terms and conditions before using our services:

1. Use of this application is subject to the applicable terms and conditions.

2. We respect your privacy and will protect personal data in accordance with our privacy policy.

3. Any use that violates the terms may result in access restrictions or termination of service.

Thank you for your attention.
profile_center_info:
Welcome to our Help Center.

We are here to help you with any questions or issues you may have regarding the use of our app.

Please find answers to frequently asked questions in our FAQ section.

If you don't find the answer you are looking for, please feel free to contact our support team via email or phone number listed on the app's contact page.

Thank you.
profile_about_us1: Welcome to the English Learning Application Based on Games. Here, you will enhance your English skills through interactive features such as word matching, translation, dictionary, and constructing sentences.
profile_about_us4: Our content is designed to be engaging and user-friendly, making learning enjoyable and effective.
profile_about_us6: Our application integrates game mechanics to make learning English fun and motivating.
profile_about_us8: Our levels are designed to challenge your logic and problem-solving skills, enhancing your cognitive abilities.
profile_about_us10: We offer a wide range of features, including word matching, sentence construction, translation, and more.
profile_about_us15: Enhance your translation skills by translating words and sentences between English and your native language.
profile_about_us17: Match English words with their meanings or synonyms to improve your vocabulary.
profile_about_us19: Construct grammatically correct sentences from given words, enhancing your grammar and syntax skills.
